attributes.action: Use the power of advertising on TV to raise awareness of green issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TV advertisements are seen nationally and hold sway over the nation. Why don't we use this for a good cause? Using the best possible advertising agencies available would mean the government could spread the green word far more efficiently - and with greater emotive impact. And while we're at it, why not reduce the advertising costs to companies and products on TV that are promoting a greener lifestyle?
